person.persName: Samuel H. Hart (Louisville, Kentucky, hackman and driver)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, hackman and driver. Indiana native. Married to Ellen R. Emory in Floyd County, Indiana, on May 29, 1850. Father of Henry Hart, G.A. Hart, Harriet F. Hart, and Leanna Priestly Hart. Resident of Louisville in 1860. Hackman in Louisville in 1861. Driver in Louisville in 1865.
